title: Supermarket Sweep

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "put it in the basket!" on the other.
• Read the shopping list aloud to the switch user (up to 5 items).
• Hold up physical items e.g., play food and ask the switch user, "Was this on our list?"
• If they press the "next" switch, show the next item.
• If they press the "put it in the basket!" switch, place the item in the basket.
• At the end of the game, go through the items in the basket and check them against the list. The switch user earns one point for each correct item!

tooltipText: Create a shopping list and use 2 switches to scan through play food items and get as many items off the list as you can remember!
